author: Katherine Bindley
title: Never Believe This: ‘I Don’t Want Anything for Mother’s Day’
text:
Megan Fowler’s mom insisted she didn’t want a Mother’s Day gift last year.
“I remember very clearly her telling me that she didn’t want anything” after being asked what she’d like, says Ms. Fowler, a 35-year-old Edmonton, Alberta, teacher. “I made dinner,” she says, “but there was no gift.”
That was unwise.
...
